title: Cello Hiki no Gauche (1982) (Gauche the Cellist)
synopsis: The story concerns Gauche, a professional cellist. During rehearsals for a performance, he is scolded by the conductor because his playing is not good enough. His timing is off and he seems to have no "feel" for the music.
related_anime: ['Cello Hiki no Gauche', 'Cello Hiki no Gauche (OVA)']
staff: [['Takahata, Isao', ['Director']], ['Urakami, Yasuo', ['Sound Director']], ['Miyazawa, Kenji', ['Original Creator']], ['Tomonaga, Kazuhide', ['Key Animation']]]
